mapper.insert: insert into BOARD(MNUMBER, KINDOFBOARD, TITLE, CONTENT, IMGPATH, VIDEO, WRTIME, CHECKPUBLIC) values (#{mNumber}, #{kindOfBoard}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgPath}, null, SYSDATE, #{checkPublic})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BOARD B inner join MEMBER M on B.MNUMBER = M.MNUMBER
and B.TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and B.CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and M.NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and (B.TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or B.CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
and B.KINDOFBOARD = #{kindOfBoard}

select * from (select ROWNUM as NUM, A.* from (select * from BOARD B inner join MEMBER M on B.MNUMBER = M.MNUMBER
and B.TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and B.CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and M.NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and (B.TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or B.CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
and B.KINDOFBOARD = #{kindOfBoard}
order by B.BNUMBER desc) A) where NUM between #{start} and #{end}
select M.NAME from BOARD B inner join MEMBER M on B.MNUMBER = M.MNUMBER where B.BNUMBER = #{pk}
select * from BOARD where KINDOFBOARD = #{kindOfBoard} order by BNUMBER desc
select * from ( select B.*, M.NAME from MEMBER M inner join BOARD B on M.MNUMBER = B.MNUMBER where KINDOFBOARD = '입양후기' order by BNUMBER DESC ) where rownum < 4
